about_the_game:
Nature is Calling.

In the wilds of Nepal, animals flock to the nearest watering hole. While these lands offer abundance for the species that visit, dangers lurk in the shadows...

From the publishers of the award-winning Evolution series comes a brand new expandable game system, Nature, where players create and adapt species in an ecosystem that changes as they play.

With over 10 years of experience designing games in the Evolution series, we have refined the core concept. Nature is easier to learn, highly interactive, and provides a more forgiving experience to new players when they are targeted by predators. Most importantly, the core game system is structured such that the expansions are easy to add on and combinable. Every expansion brings its own personality and interesting choices, and the ability to combine them makes for endless new ecosystems to discover.
detailed_description:
Kickstarter Free Demo

Try Nature and 3 Expansion Modules for free during the Nature Kickstarter, on now until October 23rd.  Check out the Nature Kickstarter for exclusive skins, promo cards, and early access to the game and modules.
